verbs.description: [ARG0: Ice Cube and other leaders of the BIG3 basketball league] [V: sent] [ARG2: Donald Trump] [ARG1: a message with a full - page ad in ' The New York Times] . ' Cube urged Trump to defend American athletes during his meeting with the Emir of Qatar .
